articles.title: Akshay Kumar attends Aanand L Rai’s mother’s last rites after mom Aruna Bhatia’s funeral - India Today
articles.description: Akshay Kumar’s mother Aruna Bhatia died on Wednesday, September 8. After her funeral, the actor was spotted arriving for director Aanand L Rai’s mother’s last rites, who also passed away today.
